datasets.name: Tampa CV Pilot Basic Safety Messages Sample
datasets.description: Contains a sample of sanitized Basic Safety Messages collected from the Tampa Connected Vehicle pilot.
datasets.altText: Link to sample Tampa CV Pilot Basic Safety Messages on data.transportation.gov

datasets.name: Tampa Connected Vehicle Pilot Basic Safety Message Visualization
datasets.description: A visualization portal for the Tampa CV Pilot Basic Safety Messages.

datasets.name: Cooperative Automated Research Mobility Applications (CARMA) 2
datasets.description: Data representing the performance of prototype cooperative automated driving system applications for improving traffic mobility.
